title: Whereas His Majesty by his letters, bearing date the fourteenth day of this instant January, to us the lord lieutenant directed, taking notice of a malicious suggestion, diffused amongst his subjects of this kingdom, as if His Majesty did desire to infringe or weaken the late Acts of Settlement and Explanation passed in this kingdom ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Essex.
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1672-1677 : Essex)
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde ...,
